name: BombViking
description:
Viking character equipped with a bomb runs to defuse the bomb

use mouse and keyboard.

If you drag the alphabet that appears in the game and put it in the box with the border, and you enter the alphabet on the keyboard, the function that matches the location is executed.

You can get a high score by disassembling the letters after properly fitting the letters in the top three boxes.

Always keep the weight at the bottom of the game centered

Avoid obstacles by jumping to restore HP
